input.sentences: a protest parade black lives matter .
a lady holding up a hands up do n't shoot sign .
a young lady holding up a sign .
a muslim looking girl with ugly look on face | hollering at people with a bullhorn .
output.sentences: Tired of being victims, the citizens decided to hold a protest parade for Black Lives Matter.
They objected to what they saw as unfair treatment of black or dark-skinned men and women.
They were joined by a diverse group of people who believed in the cause of the Black Lives Matter movement.
One of the leaders held a megaphone to make important announcements  for the safety of the protesters.
Marchers joined in with slogans but all the while they intended to remain peaceful.
